data.eml:eml: Validation of the taxon Ixodes aragaoi Fonseca (Acari: Ixodidae) based on morphological and molecular data

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Onofrio, Valeria C., Ramirez, Diego G., Giovanni, Dalton N. S., Marcili, Arlei, Mangold, Atilio J., Venzal, José M., Mendonça, Ronaldo Z., Labruna, Marcelo B., Barros-Battesti, Darci M. (2014): Validation of the taxon Ixodes aragaoi Fonseca (Acari: Ixodidae) based on morphological and molecular data. Zootaxa 3860 (4): 361-370, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3860.4.4
